column4: Hi. I have a question. I looked at the "Computer" tab in Nautilus and right-clicked on my file system and went to Properties. It shows that there is 128.2 TB of space taken up in a 250 GB hard drive. How is this possible? Here's the screenshot of it: http://oi55.tinypic.com/qyb6nd.jpg
which themes did you use for gtk and the icons?
I just modified the Ambience theme.
changed the color of the windows, input boxes, icons, etc.
